amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by Federal contractors to discriminate on the basis of sexual orientation or gender identity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of Executive Order 11246 (relating to Equal Employment Opportunity).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A075) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 184, 1 Present (Roll no. 326).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A075) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 184, 1 Present (Roll no. 326).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A075) offered by Mr. Peters.
